title: Ep113: Arras Air War - Countdown to Battle
itunes:title: Ep113: Arras Air War - Countdown to Battle
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary's exploration of the air war over Arras continues as they count down to the launch of the battle in April 1917. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content,...
description:
Pete and Gary's exploration of the air war over Arras continues as they count down to the launch of the battle in April 1917.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Support the show with a one-off donation: www.buymeacoffee.com/pgmh
